Title: Shrapnel
Description:
Shrapnel is a C# control that provides a fully interactive graph. Custom drawing code can be provided to personalize the view. Custom elements can also be added for further personalization.

(More detailed information to follow soon)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Shrapnel is a C# control that provides a fully interactive graph. Custom drawing code can be provided to personalize the view. Custom elements can also be added for further personalization.

(More detailed information to follow soon)

Here are pointers to some of our early documentation:

  • Rough system design, our first system design / object model based on our initial set of requirements
  • Coding style, some info on the used coding style and conventions
